pages.text: Unicorn! Dont you dare slay it, that would be great sin. Their blood can be drunk with a goblet to save yourself from death, but the cost of splaying something so pure would be the the $(l:bewitchment:curses/conducting_curses)Curse$() of $(l:bwplus:curses/half_life)Half Life$(), Summoned with the $(l:bewitchment:rituals/rituals#spectral_familiar)Spectral Familiar Ritual$()
